NK010(tha)030:0: smad las dug phur nag po'i dgongs pa khol du phyungs pa bzhugs so //
NK010(tha)030:1: gser skyems gzu dpang e khang bskyed pa rnams sngon
NK010(tha)030:2: du song nas bsgral las dngos la 'jug pa ni
NK010(tha)030:3: h'u dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab sprul pa
NK010(tha)030:4: chen po'i dus la bab phyag brnyan chen po'i dus
NK010(tha)030:5: la bab shwa na mu kha'i dus la bab sa
NK010(tha)030:6: bdag chen mo'i dus la bab bdag nyid chen mo'i
NK010(tha)030:7: dus la bab bran dang bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs
NK010(tha)030:8: khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab mthu rtsal dbyung
NK010(tha)030:9: ba'i dus la bab sngon chad ji ltar dam bcas
NK010(tha)030:10: bzhin mngon spyod phrin las 'grub par mdzod dngos grub
NK010(tha)030:11: bar chad byed pa'i bgegs gdug cing sdang sems ldan
NK010(tha)030:12: pa rnams gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis phob
NK010(tha)030:13: cig rnam par gzir bar gyis zungs shig rgyob cig
NK010(tha)030:14: rnam par chings rings par khug la smrar chug cig
NK010(tha)030:15: nga yi dbang du gyur nas ni bsgo ba'i bka'
NK010(tha)030:16: la nyan par byos badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya
NK010(tha)030:17: tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha h'u phata dgra bo che ge mo /
NK010(tha)030:18: ha sa ya ra ha sa ya ra h+r+ai tan+aa
NK010(tha)030:19: h'u phata dgra bgegs byad ma 'di lha dang phyes
NK010(tha)030:20: shig badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya ban+d+ha ban+d+ha h'u
NK010(tha)030:21: phata dgra bo che ge mo /
NK010(tha)030:22: a be sha ya a be sha ya h'u phata dgra bgegs byad ma gzugs la phob cig /
NK010(tha)030:23: badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha h'u phata
NK010(tha)030:24: dgra bo che ge mo sh+ai g+h+ram a na ya
NK010(tha)030:25: h'u phata dgra bgegs byad ma 'di byad du chug
NK010(tha)030:26: cig badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya gri h+na gri
NK010(tha)030:27: h+na h'u phata dgra bo che ge mo /
NK010(tha)030:28: dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya h+aum phata
NK010(tha)030:29: dgra bgegs byad ma 'di smyo ru chug cig de
NK010(tha)030:31: h'u byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing dus gsum
NK010(tha)030:32: rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob pa'i rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams
NK010(tha)030:33: la ni gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs bdud
NK010(tha)030:34: dang bar du gcod pa rnams khro bo chen po'i
NK010(tha)030:35: byin rlabs kyis yud tsam gyis ni 'dir khug la
NK010(tha)030:36: mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang lus ngag rdul
NK010(tha)030:37: du bshig nas kyang sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar
NK010(tha)030:38: mdzod lam h'u lam stam+b+ha ya nan mo ha g+ha
NK010(tha)030:39: ta ya b+ha ga wan shi kri bi kri badz+ra
NK010(tha)030:40: h'u ka ra dzahmh'u bam ho sarba big+ha nam badz+ra
NK010(tha)030:41: k+ai li k+ai la ya h'u phata h'u ka ra
NK010(tha)030:42: h'u h'u ka ra +aah zhes brjod pas bdag rdo
NK010(tha)030:43: rje gzhon nuh phur pa sras mchog ling+ga gzas po
NK010(tha)030:44: dngos su gsal ba'i gsal ba gsum ldan gyi ngang
NK010(tha)030:45: nas dal gsum gyi spyi bo dang phur pa'i rtse
NK010(tha)030:46: mo dang gzas po'i snying gar a dkar po re
NK010(tha)030:47: bsam pa a dkar bya dkar gyi dgongs pa'o spyi
NK010(tha)030:48: bo'i h'u kar yab yum dang a zhu bas dal
NK010(tha)030:49: gsum gyi sku lus rkyal ba zhos gang ba ltar
NK010(tha)030:50: dkar ltem gyis gyur cing phur pa gzas po'i snying
NK010(tha)030:51: gar nas gang tsam ma reg par bsgril bas phur
NK010(tha)030:52: rtse'i a las 'od dang a phra mo yungs kar
NK010(tha)030:53: tsam 'phro ba gzas po'i a la thim zhing de
NK010(tha)030:54: las kyang 'od phar 'phros shing tshur 'dus pas sdig
NK010(tha)030:55: sgrib dag nas bsgral ba'i skal ldan du gyur par
NK010(tha)030:56: bsam pa kho'i khrus lung ste sngags bzla shing yun
NK010(tha)030:57: bsring ngo de nas bdag phur gzas gsum dgongs pa
NK010(tha)030:58: gcig dam tshig gcig chos nyid gcig gis 'brel bar
NK010(tha)030:59: shes pa thugs rje 'brel thag gi dgongs pa'o /
NK010(tha)030:60: de nas spyir sems can thams cad dang bye brag
NK010(tha)030:61: tu gzas pa po 'khor bar mi gtong ba'i snying
NK010(tha)030:62: rje drag tu bskyed pa ni gdung ba lu gu
NK010(tha)030:63: rgyud kyi dgongs pa ste dgongs pa gsum dang ldan
NK010(tha)030:64: par bya ste re re bzhin k+ai la ya 'bru
NK010(tha)030:65: dgu ci rigs bzla bzhin dmigs pa gsal btab bo
NK010(tha)030:66: de dag ni khrus lung ngo de nas tshe lung
NK010(tha)030:67: la h'u rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni sdig
NK010(tha)030:68: can gang zhig 'da' byed pa stobs chen khro bo
NK010(tha)030:69: chen po yis klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos
NK010(tha)030:70: nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs nga yi bka'
NK010(tha)030:71: las 'da' ma byed gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa
NK010(tha)030:72: yi lha'am 'on te bdud kyang rung nga la bar
NK010(tha)030:73: chad byed pa'i bgegs mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par
NK010(tha)030:75: rtsa sngags brjod bzhin phur pa nas gang ma reg
NK010(tha)030:76: tsam du dbang po'i sgo lnga la bsgril bas sgo
NK010(tha)030:77: lnga'i rnam shes sbra yi chon thag bsdus pa bzhin
NK010(tha)030:78: kun gzhi la 'ub kyis 'dus par bsam pa ni
NK010(tha)030:79: dang por byung tshor gyi sgo dgag pa zhes bya'o
NK010(tha)030:80: de nas yang sngags bzla bzhin phur bu snying gar
NK010(tha)030:81: btabs pas kho'i pags pa sha khrag 'big ste snying
NK010(tha)030:82: dkar nag gi 'brel mtshams dral nas phur bu'i 'od
NK010(tha)030:83: kyis snying dkar nag gi mtshams na khrag gi sbal
NK010(tha)030:84: pa mthe bong tsam yod pa bsros de'i nang na
NK010(tha)030:85: dwangs ma gsum ste tsa'i dwangs ma rgyus pa bldad
NK010(tha)030:86: pa 'dra ba khrag gi dwangs ma mtshal cog la
NK010(tha)030:87: ma lta bu dbugs kyi dwangs ma gser sa 'og
NK010(tha)030:88: tu sbas pa'i rlangs pa tsam gsum yod pa de
NK010(tha)030:89: gsum gyi dbus su kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa
NK010(tha)030:90: a thung gi tshul du yod pa de la phur
NK010(tha)030:91: rtses reg pas khab len la lcags ltar phur rtser
NK010(tha)030:92: 'ub kyis 'dus shing dwangs ma gsum skam par bsam
NK010(tha)030:93: pa ni sems kyi dbyis phyungs nas kun gzhi rtsad
NK010(tha)030:94: bcad pa'o de ltar kho rang gi rnam shes slar
NK010(tha)030:95: mi ldog par tshur bsdus pa'i shul der phur pa
NK010(tha)030:96: gzhan gcig btab la bzhag go de nas phur rtse
NK010(tha)030:97: rang gi snying gar gtad pas a yig de'i bkrag
NK010(tha)030:98: mdangs gzi brjid thams cad dngul chu'i thigs pa ltar
NK010(tha)030:99: bsdus te bdag gi snying gar thim pas dmigs bya'i
NK010(tha)030:100: tshe bsod nams thams cad bdag gi gsos su thim
NK010(tha)030:101: par bsam pa ni bdag gi tshe lung ste re
NK010(tha)030:102: re bzhin sngags bzla zhing dmigs pa gsal btab bo
NK010(tha)030:104: h'u snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni bsad cing
NK010(tha)030:105: mnan pa ma yin te phung po rdo rjes gtams
NK010(tha)030:106: byas nas rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom zhes
NK010(tha)030:107: byas la phur rtse gyen du bstan la lag pa
NK010(tha)030:108: ya gcig gis phur pa'i mgo nas gyen la gdab
NK010(tha)030:109: pa dang mnyam du ye shes kyi rlung ha re
NK010(tha)030:110: langs pas kho'i shes pa a thung de me stag
NK010(tha)030:111: yar ba bzhin btegs nas 'og min du rigs lnga'i
NK010(tha)030:113: a a a phata zhes brjod cing gnyis su med
NK010(tha)030:114: pa'i sras dam par gyur par bsam la rtsa sngags
NK010(tha)030:115: ci rigs bazla'o de nas mi dge bcu tshar gcod
NK010(tha)030:116: pa'i khro bcu'i phur pa dang sgo ma'i phur ba
NK010(tha)030:117: sogs lus gnas so sor gdab ste dum bu tshal
NK010(tha)030:118: par byas par bsam la drag sngags rak+mo bzla bzhin
NK010(tha)030:119: phur pa so sor yod na de dang min na
NK010(tha)030:120: las phur gyis gdab bo de nas rdul du brlag
NK010(tha)030:121: pa / h'u rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun
NK010(tha)030:122: bka' las 'da' byed sdig can rnams rdo rje me
NK010(tha)030:123: dbal snying bsregs nas lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du
NK010(tha)030:124: rlogs khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du rdo rje
NK010(tha)030:125: tho bas brdung byas nas lha yang rung ste bsgral
NK010(tha)030:126: bar bya badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya ha na
NK010(tha)030:127: ha na h'u phata dgra bgegs che ge mo /
NK010(tha)030:128: ta tha ya ta tha ya h'u phata dgra bgegs
NK010(tha)030:129: byad ma rnams rdul du rlog cig kha tham kha
NK010(tha)030:130: tham kha tham h'u h'u h'u phata phata phata drug
NK010(tha)030:131: pa zhal du bstab pa h'u dam tshig chen po'i
NK010(tha)030:132: dus la bab dgra bgegs sha khrag mchod pa bzhes
NK010(tha)030:133: bran dang bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs khyed kyi dam
NK010(tha)030:134: tshig dus la bab sha khrag mchod pa 'di bzhes
NK010(tha)030:135: la bsgo ba'i bka' la nyan par byos badz+ra k+ai
NK010(tha)030:136: li k+ai la ya pa ra bid+ya h'u phata dgra
NK010(tha)030:138: b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha h'u phata dgra bgegs byed ma'i sha khrag
NK010(tha)030:139: rus gsum bzhes shig rol cig badz+ra yak+sha kro d+ha
NK010(tha)030:140: kh+aa hi zhes btab pas lha rnams dgyes nas /
NK010(tha)030:141: ha ha ha zhes pas bzhad sgra di ri ri gsol /
NK010(tha)030:142: h'u h'u h'u zhes pas dngos grub stsol phata phata
NK010(tha)030:143: phata kyis dgra bgegs dbyings su bsgral bar bsam mo
NK010(tha)030:144: de nas gso ba gsum gyi dgongs pa dang ldan
NK010(tha)030:145: pa'i sgo nas smon lam gdab pa ni ho dgongs
NK010(tha)030:146: su gsol lo chos nyid kyi bden pa'o gsang sngags
NK010(tha)030:147: kyi byin gyis rlab bo sangs rgyas kyi mathu'o a
NK010(tha)030:148: b+hi tsar+ya'i dus la bab bo brnag pa de kho
NK010(tha)030:149: na la'o zhes brjod cing k+ai la ya brgya rtsa
NK010(tha)030:150: brgyad bzlas pas gong gi phur pa'i khro bo spros
NK010(tha)030:151: pa thams cad 'od kyi gong bur gyur nas bdag
NK010(tha)030:152: la 'dus pas me la bud shing bsnan pa ltar
NK010(tha)030:153: rang nyid gzi brjid sngar bas kyang ches mchog tu
NK010(tha)030:154: 'bar bar bsam pa ni bdag gso ba'oh yang k+ai
NK010(tha)030:155: la ya nyer gcig bzlas shing gdab phur rnams phyungs
NK010(tha)030:156: la gtso phur dang bcas lan gsum klad la g.yugs
NK010(tha)030:157: pas khams gsum srid gsum thams cad khro bo phur
NK010(tha)030:158: phu stod zhal gsum phyag drug smad lcags sreg gi
NK010(tha)030:159: phur bu zur gsum pa mgal gyi sol mal nas
NK010(tha)030:160: phyungs pa lta bu de thams cad sku che la
NK010(tha)030:161: yan lag rags pa stong gsum ba spur tshud pa'i
NK010(tha)030:162: tshul gyi sgra 'brug stong ltar 'ur 'ur dang glog
NK010(tha)030:163: bskal me ltar chem chem g.yo ba kun las rnam
NK010(tha)030:164: par rgyal ba'i mthu stobs nus pa mtshungs pa med
NK010(tha)030:165: pa'i rang bzhin du bsam pa ni phur pa gso
NK010(tha)030:166: ba'o yang k+ai la ya bco brgyad bzlas te bsgril
NK010(tha)030:167: bas khro bo phur pa'i tshogs rnams bsgral bya'i zhing
NK010(tha)030:168: du gyur pa'i dgra bgegs gdug pa can rnams gang
NK010(tha)030:169: na gnas pa'i snying dkar nag gi mtshams su btab
NK010(tha)030:170: pas de dag gi rnam shes h'u du bsdus pa
NK010(tha)030:171: +aahls zla dkyil gyi steng du bzhag yam las rlung
NK010(tha)030:172: gis btegs te 'og min du rgyal ba yab yum
NK010(tha)030:173: gyi sbyor mtshams su 'phang bas 'khor bar gnas pa
NK010(tha)030:174: kun gyi las ngan rgyun chad par bsam pa ni
NK010(tha)030:175: gzas pa po gso ba'o de ltar byas pas nus
NK010(tha)030:176: pa rnams nyams pa gso zhing mthu stobs me la
NK010(tha)030:177: shing bsnan pa bzhin du 'phel lo de nas thal
NK010(tha)030:178: mo sbyar te hoh dpal chen po'i lha tshogs thams
NK010(tha)030:179: cad dgongs su gsol ta na sgrol ba gnas su
NK010(tha)030:180: ma stob pa dang ga na sbyor ba byin gyis
NK010(tha)030:181: ma rlob pa dang mchod sngags dang ting 'dzin ma
NK010(tha)030:182: dag cing nyams pa dang dge ba bcu dang du
NK010(tha)030:183: ma blangs zhing mi dge bcu rtsad ma chod pa
NK010(tha)030:184: dang bka' bzhin gzhung ma bsrang ba dang dam tshig
NK010(tha)030:185: rtsa ba dang yan lag chag nyams su gyur pa
NK010(tha)030:186: ci mchis pa thams cad mthol zhing bshags na bzod
NK010(tha)030:187: pa dam pa mdzad du gsol tshe 'di'i rkyen dang
NK010(tha)030:188: yun gyi sgrib par mi 'gyur bar tshangs pa dam
NK010(tha)030:189: pa stsol ba ci gnang de ltar gsang sngags kyi
NK010(tha)030:190: spyod pa rmad du byung ba spyad pa'i mthu byin
NK010(tha)030:191: gyis sbyor ba lam du longs sgrol ba tshad du
NK010(tha)030:192: phyin sngags kyi mthu grub nas dpal chen po rdo
NK010(tha)030:193: rje gzhon nu'i sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las
NK010(tha)030:194: mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo la longs spyod
NK010(tha)030:195: cing skal pa mnyam par gyur cig ces bya'o dug
NK010(tha)030:196: phur rdzogs so lhag ma ni /
NK010(tha)030:197: h'u dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu yi bran dang
NK010(tha)030:198: bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs shwa na bdag nyid sa
NK010(tha)030:199: bdag ma bse lcags dung gi skyes bu sogs khyed
NK010(tha)030:200: kyi dam tshig dus la bab lhag ma'i gtor ma
NK010(tha)030:201: 'di bzhes la sngon chad ci ltar dam bcas pa'i
NK010(tha)030:202: mngon spyod phrin las 'grub par mdzod ha na ha
NK010(tha)030:203: na badz+ra da ha da ha badz+ra pa tsa pa
NK010(tha)030:204: tsa badz+ra ma tha ma tha badz+ra dz+wa la dz+wa
NK010(tha)030:205: la badz+ra su ru su ru badz+ra mu ru mu
NK010(tha)030:206: ru badz+ra ka tam ka ye dza ye bi dza
NK010(tha)030:207: ye a dzi te a pa ra dzi te m+aa
NK010(tha)030:208: ra s+ae n+aa pra ma rda ni h'u phata h'u
NK010(tha)030:209: ma ma pa sham ku ru ma tam nya ka
NK010(tha)030:210: ra i nan d+ha ti ma ma shi g+h+ram ka
NK010(tha)030:211: ra ye ba lim ta kh+aa hi drag sngags dug
NK010(tha)030:213: smad las dug phur nag po 'di //
NK010(tha)030:214: rig 'dzin brgyud pa'i phyag bzhes bzhin //
NK010(tha)030:215: bstan dgra bsgral ba'i mtshon char phyung //
NK010(tha)030:216: rgyud lung gi dgongs bcud ma nor bar 'jam dpal rdo rjes bsdebs pa mang+ga lam //
